actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to stimulate the design, development, and manufacture of high definition television technology, and for other purposes.
short_title: High Definition Television Development Act of 1989

summary.text: High Definition Television Development Act of 1989 - Title I: Authority to Engage in Joint Actions to Promote Development - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the application of antitrust laws to any cooperative high definition television (HDTV) enterprise engaged in a joint research, development, or production venture with respect to which certain notification has been given. Title II: International Trade - Requires the Secretary of Commerce to submit a report to the President and the Congress on the implications for international trade of HDTV technology.

titles.title: High Definition Television Development Act of 1989
A bill to stimulate the design, development, and manufacture of high definition television technology, and for other purposes.
